eu.cassandra.sim
Class Period

java.lang.Object
  eu.cassandra.sim.Period

public class Period
extends java.lang.Object

A from-to-price tripplet defining a period of specific pricing, used in pricing policies.

Constructor Summary
Period(java.lang.String afrom, java.lang.String ato, double aprice)
          Instantiates a new period of with a specific price.
